name: Space Pow Collins
description:
Space Pow Collins is a text adventure game created for Ludum Dare 38 - Small World. It takes place on a small space vessel captained by the famous Space Pow Collins. Will you be able to get him out of this sticky situation.

Inspired by 'Don't Shit Your Pants' by Cellar Door Games.

There are 7 endings to find, can you find them all?

Thanks for playing :)

Tip:

You want to use your environment, so for example if there is an object that stands out in the room you want to do something to the specific object i.e. press purple button.
